title: Sagamore Hill National Historic Site: Suggested Reading
body: Suggested Reading       There are more than 800 books connected with Theodore Roosevelt. This is a small sampling of some of most popular works.  Brands, H. W. T. R.: The Last Romantic Dalton, Kathleen. Theodore Roosevelt: A Strenuous Life Hagedorn, Hermann. TheRooseveltFamily of Sagamore Hill Lorant, Stefan. The Life and Times of Theodore Roosevelt McCullough, David. Mornings on Horseback Millard, Candace. River of Doubt Miller, Nathan. Theodore Roosevelt: A Life Morris, Edmund. The Rise of Theodore Roosevelt Morris, Edmund. Theodore Rex Morris, Edmund. Colonel Roosevelt Morris, Sylvia Jukes. Edith Kermit Roosevelt: Portrait of a First Lady Renehan, Edward J. Jr. The Lion's Pride: Theodore Roosevelt and His Family in Peace and War Roosevelt, Theodore. Autobiography Roosevelt, Theodore. Theodore Roosevelt's Letters to his Children Roosevelt, Theodore. Letters to Kermit from Theodore Roosevelt Roosevelt, Theodore Jr. All in the Family
